01 西方后现代主义观照下的当代视觉文化艺术研究
—— 访加拿大康科迪亚大学段炼博士
Research on Contemporary Visual Culture and Art in the Perspective of Western Postmodernism : An interview with Dr. Duan Lian
陈芸 CHEN Yun 俞一青 YU Yiqing 浙江理工大学，杭州 310018 （Zhejiang Sci-Tech University，310018 Hangzhou）
摘要：视觉文化研究是当代学术研究的新领域，也是当前学术界的一个热门话题。加拿大康科迪亚大学的段炼博士在视觉文化艺 术研究领域著述颇丰，主要有《视觉文化与视觉艺术符号学：艺术史研究的新视角》、《视觉的愉悦与挑战：艺术传播与图像研究》、 《图像丛林：当代艺术批评》等著作。他从符号阐释的语境与本体的符号关系为视角，结合艺术史的发展，深入研究艺术作品的 图像符号及其意义阐释，揭示了视觉文化对现当代文化生态和艺术观念的影响与作用，并在西方后现代主义的情境下，探讨中国 本土的艺术文化现象，探索中国气象的视觉文化理论。 关键词：视觉文化；当代艺术；图像符号；艺术现象 Abstract: The study of visual culture starts a new step of contemporary academic research, and it is also a hot topic in the academic community. Dr. Duan Lian works in Concordia University, Canada and he is a very popular scholar and writer in the field of visual culture academic research. His recent works include Visual Culture and Visual Art Semeiology, Vision: Between Pleasure and challenge, Personal essays about the Images around, etc. He reveals the roles and influences of contemporary cultural ecology and the art conception of visual culture from the perspective of symbolic interpretation in the terms of the meanings of art works, and to deeply explore the Chinese theory of visual culture in the context of the contemporary art history. Key words: visual culture；contemporary art；image and symbol；art phenomenon
中图分类号：J0 文献标识码：A doi：10.3963/j.issn.2095-0705.2017.01.001（0001-05）
著名艺术评论家、视觉文化研究学者。20 世纪 60 年代初生于四川省成都市， 文学博士、美术教育学博士。20 世纪 80 年代，任教于四川大学中文系，讲授西方文学。 20 世纪 90 年代，留学加拿大，研习艺术教育。随后任教于美国纽约州立大学（State University of New York）和威廉姆斯学院（Williams college）等校，现为加拿大康科 迪亚大学（Concordia University）文理学院中文项目负责人，讲授中国文学、视觉文化、 艺术史等课程。研究领域为视觉艺术与比较文学，专注于史论和批评方法，并从事 艺术评论与文学写作。近 30 年来，发表有学术论文、文艺评论、散文随笔等 300 余篇， 并出版译著、专著、文集 10 余种。目前，正在选编《米克·巴尔（Mieke Bal）符 号学译文集》；撰写专著《视觉文化：从艺术史到当代艺术研究》，以及英汉双语 专著《艺术史符号学：重新阐释中国山水画的发展》。同时，也为纽约大都会艺术 博物馆（Metropolitan Museum of Art）、纽约林肯表演艺术中心（Lincoln Center For The Performing Arts）、华盛顿史密森国家博物馆（ Smithsonian Institution）校对中 段炼 文导览。
收稿日期：2016-10-08 作者简介：陈芸，浙江理工大学艺术与设计学院副教授；俞一青，浙江理工大学艺术与设计学院助理研究员。

02 从美术教育到现代设计与室内设计
—— 王建柱先生的学术贡献管窥
From Art Education to Modern Design and Interior Design： On Mr. Wang Jianzhu’s Academic Contribution
李洋 LI Yang 福建工程学院，福州 350118（Fujian University of Technology , 350118Fuzhou）
摘要：王建柱是 20 世纪下半叶中国台湾著名的美术教育家、现代设计家与室内设计家。他提倡将设计纳入到美术教育的内容之中， 并培养了一批优秀人才。他翻译的《设计运动一百年》及出版的《包浩斯：现代设计教育的根源》对现代设计在中国的传播影响极大。 他的室内设计研究具有重要的学术价值，同时，他还致力于室内设计知识的大众传播和普及。 关键词：王建柱；学术贡献；美术教育；现代设计；室内设计 Abstract: Wang Jianzhu is a famous art educator, modern designer and interior designer in Taiwan of the second half of the 20th century. He advocated the design into the content of the art education, and cultivated a large number of outstanding talents. His translation of The Design Movement of One Hundred Years and publication of The Bauhaus: The Root of the Modern Design Education, had great effect on the spread of the modern design in China. His interior design research is of important academic value. He also strived to popularize the knowledge of interior design to mass communicationw. Key words: Wang Jianzhu；academic contribution；art education；modern design；interior design

黄群 HUANG Qun 庄原 ZHUANG Yuan 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan）
摘要：随着科技的迅猛发展，人们对健康日益关注，诸多可穿戴医疗辅具逐步走进人们的生活。但目前可穿戴医疗辅具专业度不高， 无法满足病患群体的切身需求。从实际产品出发，总结病患群体可穿戴式医疗辅具的设计原则，再与设计实践相结合，希望能为 面向病患群体的可穿戴辅具设计提供支持。 关键词：医疗物联网；可穿戴医疗辅具；病患群体；设计应用 Abstract: With the rapid development of science and technology people are increasingly concerned about their health which make wearable medical aids gradually affected our lives. However, wearable medical aids cannot meet patients’ actual needs for the unprofessional standard at present. This article starts from the actual product and summarizes the design principles of wearable medical aids for patient group. Finally, combined with the design practice it aims to provide some theoretical supports of wearable medical aids for patients. Key words: Medical things networking；wearable medical aids；patients；design practice

04 新疆和中亚陶器的传承与文化交流 *
Inheritance and Cultural Exchange in Pottery between Xinjiang and Central Asia
热孜婉古丽•吾其孔ReZiWanGuLi•WuQiKong 伊明江•阿布都热依木YiMingJiang•AbuDuReYiMu 新疆艺术学院，乌鲁木齐 830049（Xinjiang Arts Institute，830049 Urumqi）
摘要：新疆和中亚由于历史和地理环境的原因，在文化艺术上进行着各种交流，彼此之间有着千丝万缕的联系。陶器作为新疆和 中亚的一个文化载体，不仅体现着两地文化发展与交流的层次性，而且还反映着两地文化发展的流变性。分析从新疆和中亚阶级 社会形成起，到中世纪伊斯兰教文化艺术在两地各民族生活和文化中确立止，来探讨新疆和中亚陶器文化的交流和传承。说明在 陶器文化上，由于独特的历史环境和地理位置，造就了两地陶器文化的某些相似性，而发展过程中更是在相互继承的同时，受着 各种外来文明的冲击和影响，从低级到高级、从简单到复杂，是一个动态的，不断积累、丰富、完善、双向交流和互动的历史过 程和发展规律。 关键词：新疆；中亚；陶器；文化交流 Abstract: Due to geography and the forces of history, interaction in art and culture in many forms has taken place between Xinjiang and Central Asia, and there are countless relational ties between them. Pottery has served as a conveyor of culture and serves now as a microcosm of the cultural exchange between Xinjiang and Central Asia. It exemplifies the stair-step character of their cultural development and interaction， and reflects as well the fluctuating nature of the cultural development of these two areas. Beginning with the early class-societies in Xinjiang and Central Asia, through the establishment of medieval Islamic culture and art in the lives and cultures of the ethnic groups of these two areas, this article discusses the interaction and heritage of Xinjiang and Central Asia within this realm of pottery. It then explains that it was the particular historical circumstances and the geographic location which gave rise to certain similarities in the “pottery culture” of these two regions and that in the process of development there was a great deal that they inherited from each other. In addition, they also received many types of civilizing influence and input from the outside world. From a low level to a high level, from simple to complex, the art of pottery followed a rich, dynamic, continuously accumulating and perfecting, two-way interactive historical process and pattern of development. 摘要：五月初五端午节，除吃粽子、插艾草、赛龙舟、饮雄黄等习俗外，一些地方也形成了独特的地方端午习俗。山西晋北地区 尤其是大同、朔州一带的，在端午时节，家家户户门窗粘贴五色纸符及剪纸公鸡，人人系五色线、佩五谷香包。这些传统民间工 艺品图案新颖、色彩绚丽、工艺精巧。其中的五色纸符，就是古人智慧地将一些简单几何图形进行抽象化来表现动物神兽，并寄 予美好期望与寓意的传统民间工艺品。这些端午习俗下的传统民间工艺品，在一定程度上折射出一个地区人们的民间色彩五色审 美观，以及五行学说之“五色”崇拜。对此，以美学视觉，从大同端午民俗的形象符号、色彩学、工艺审美等方面予以深入探讨。 关键词：五色纸符；五色线；五谷香包；剪纸公鸡；民间工艺 Abstract: On the Dragon Boat Festival, in addition to eating dumplings, plug wormwood, race dragon boat, drinking realgar and other customs, some places also formed a unique local custom. In Shanxi a custom is for every household door and window stickers and colored paper cutting chicken, all five lines and grain sachet. The traditional process of new patterns, brilliant colors, sophisticated technology, especially the five-color character, the first wisdom of some simple abstract performance of animal geometry animal, giving them good expectations and moral. These folk customs reflect a people's folk color "five colors" aesthetic, five elements of the "five" color worship. This article takes the aesthetic point of view from the image of Datong Dragon Boat Festival folklore symbol, color science, to study craft aesthetic in-depth. It aims at promoting the essence of traditional folk culture, making people respect the external festivals at the same time to know the traditional culture. Key words: colored paper character；colored line；grain sachet；paper-cut cock；folk craft

林杨程 LIN Yangcheng 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，Wuhan 430070）
摘要：环境艺术设计是基于物质实体之上的创作，是实用功能与美学价值的结合。从符号学角度对环境艺术设计中作品的进行分析， 促进了建筑符号学、设计符号学等学科分支的产生。环境艺术设计是人类物质文化与精神创造的综合体现，其中包括了人文风貌、 时代价值观念，以及生产力发展水平等多个方面。环境艺术设计中的符号具有能指和所指的功能，它们是社会经济、文化、精神 情感等的载体，也是从形式上对人类价值观念、美学内涵的传达。因此，环境艺术设计是物质价值和精神价值的结合体。 关键词：环境艺术设计；符号学；精神文化价值 Abstract: The environmental art design is the creation based on the material entity and the combination of both practical function and aesthetic value. Analyzing the works of the environmental art design from the angle of semiology promotes the generation of branches of disciplines as architectural semiology,semiology and so on. Environmental art design is an integrated reflection of human material culture and spiritual creation, which includes several aspects such as the humanities features, the times value and the development of productivity. The “symbol”, which falls within the scope of “environmental art design”, has the function of “signans and designatum”. The symbol serves as the carrier of social economy, cultural and spiritual emotions as well as the expression of human values and aesthetic connotation from the formal. The environmental art design, therefore, is the combination of both material and spiritual values. Key words: environmental art design；semiology；spiritual and cultural value

07 中国传统画法的新变
—— 论常玉裸体艺术东西方绘画之综合性
Integration of Eastern and Western Painting in Sanyu’s Nude Paintings
王美艳 WANG Meiyan 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070 （Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan）
摘要：常玉的裸体绘画既不追随西方写实风格的学院派，也不追随当时正风行的法国印象派。20 世纪初期绘画艺术的革新运动为 东西方艺术综合提供了社会舆论基础；中国写意画和西方现代派绘画都强调不要隐藏绘画媒材的局限，提倡以开放的结构展示笔 触的轨迹，为东西方绘画之综合提供了可能。常玉 1920 至 1930 年代的女性裸体画总体有以下主要特点：混合了独特的中国元素 和西方现代派理念，包括国画的笔法和中国传统文人的审美意识，坚实的素描和造型基础，以及现代派的极简、变形、超现实、 夸张、幻想与想象等创作理念，体现了中西画法的交叠，中西艺术实践的跨界交叉。 关键词：常玉；裸体艺术；综合性；现代派 Abstract: Sanyu’s nude paintings neither follow western academic realistic style nor French impressionism. The innovation of painting in early 20th century provided public opinion foundation for integration of eastern and western art. Both traditional Chinese painting and western modernism painting all emphasized not hiding the limits of painting material and encouraging open structure to show the motion of brush stroke, which offered the possibilities to combining eastern and western painting. Between 1920 and 1930s, San Yu’s female nude paintings contain the following main traits: mixed special Chinese elements and western modernism concept; including Chinese painting’s calligraphy and aesthetic consciousness of Chinese literati; talented sketch and modeling foundation; as well as creative ideas like modern minimalism, deformation, surreality, exaggeration, fantasy and imagination. Sanyu’s nude paintings reflect the overlap of Chinese and Western Painting Skills and realize crossing the boundary between Chinese and western art. Key words: Sanyu；Nude Art；integrity；Modernism

On the Developments of Modern Chinese Art History : Taking Chinese Freehand Flower-and-bird Painting as an Example
龚余辉 GONG Yuhui 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，Wuhan 430070）
摘要：通过对现当代画家的诗书画印等作品的解析，以及自我创作的感悟，论述现当代中国艺术史之变迁及其对当代画家创作的 启示。古代写意花鸟画已经发展到了一个巅峰，在近现代花鸟画发展中，由吴昌硕转换文人画风，书写了 20 世纪花鸟画史上灿烂 的篇章。正是这一批有影响力的大师们，对 21 世纪的写意花鸟画的发展与变迁起到承上启下的作用，形成了现当代写意花鸟画的 多元化格局。当代的写意花鸟画如何传承与创新，画出更具有时代特色的写意花鸟画，也是当代写意花鸟画家的创作追求。 关键词：笔墨情趣；诗画融合；诗书画印；传承演进；写意花鸟画 Abstract: Chinese freehand flower-and-bird painting reached its peak in ancient times and was developed greatly in modern times by some famous painters such as Wu Changshuo who changed painting style and created the most brilliant chapter in the history of flower-and-bird painting in the 20th century. With the crucial role those influential painters have played, freehand flower-and-bird painting entered the 21th century with diversified styles. How to inherit the achievements of the predecessors and keep pace with the times to create new works with contemporary characteristics has been a significant task worth contemporary artists’ attention. Analyzing the works of some modern and contemporary artists including their poems, calligraphies, paintings and seals, this paper mainly discusses the changes and developments of Chinese art history since the reform and opening up. Key words: lliterary taste；agreement of poem and painting；integration of poem,calligraphy,painting and seal；inheritance and development；freehand flower-and-bird painting

10 公共设施产品设计中的“行为引导”研究 *
Behavior Guide Design for Municipal Service Facilities
苟锐 GOU Rui 马泽群 MA Zequn 西南交通大学，成都 610000（Southwest Jiaotong University，Chengdu 610000）
摘要：设计与行为是紧密联系的一对互动关系，设计影响行为，行为反作用于设计，两者互相影响、互相促进。设计师关注生活, 本质上关注的是人们的行为。由于交互设计的兴起，人们对行为与设计的关注与理解超乎以往，但在一些传统的设计领域却存在 低估行为与设计关系的现象，借对公共设施产品设计与行为的关系研究，阐述行为对于设计的影响和导向性作用。 关键词：用户体验；AT-ONE法则；居家养老服务平台；APP Abstract: Design and behavior are a pair of closed reaction actors. Design affects behavior directly, at same time, behavior affects design indirectly. Designer’s focus on life is due to behavior. Nowadays, interactive design raised the knowledge of relationship between behaviors with design, but in traditional design area it has been underestimated. This paper uses municipal service facilities design as an example to explain how behavior can guide design in many cases. Key words: design；behavior；environment behavior；municipal service facilities

Throughout the design of the senior-client-end APP example to improve the home-aged interactive platform and promote the development of China’s social service system of intelligent old—age care. 摘要：烙画作为源于民间的工艺美术形式与江南地区的特色家居文化相融，形成了具有强烈的地方文化色彩的特色家居制品。分 析江南地区家居制品的烙画题材，例说烙画艺术在江南地区家居制品中的应用，探究烙画艺术在江南地区家居制品中应用的优势。 关键词：烙画艺术；江南地区；家居制品 Abstract: Pyrography, as a kind of arts and crafts, originated from the folk. In the south of the Yangtze River of China, pyrography on home products has formed the regional feature because of the special geography and culture. The subject of pyrography on home products was analyzed and some application examples were discussed in the paper. The application advantage of pyrography on home products in the south region of Yangtze River was explored. Key words: pyrography；the south region of Yangtze River；home products

13 空藏万象，别有洞天*
—— 对版式设计中空白意象的探究
The Implications of Functional Blank-leaving in Layout
Design
李鸿明 LI Hongming 东莞职业技术学院，广东 东莞 523808（Dongguan Polytechnic，Guangdong Dongguan 523808）
摘要：空白能通过其特殊的表现方式在版式设计中表现出独特的艺术意象，而通过改变空白的大小、比例等不同的方面能够使版 式体现出不同的艺术风格来吸引读者的视线。从版式设计发展的历程出发，分析空白在版式设计中的运用和审美特征，并在其价 值体现的基础上，探讨了空白对版式设计艺术表现的运用策略，以期能为版式设计提供有效借鉴。 关键词：空白；版式设计；艺术表现；审美特征；价值体现 Abstract: Blank can express the unique artistic image in the layout design through its special expression way, but changing the size and the proportion of the blank and so on can make the layout reflect different artistic styles to attract the readers’ attention. Based on the history development of layout design, this paper analyzes the aesthetic characteristics of blank expression and application in layout design, and explores the strategy of Blank Aesthetics in layout design by analyzing the mindset of art based on the application value realization of blank in layout design, with a view to provide an effective reference for Chinese layout design. Key words: blank；layout design；expression of art；aesthetic characteristics；value realization

A Research of Wuhan Shop Window Design in 1950-1980
陆江艳 LU Jiangyan 张雪娇 ZHANG Xuejiao 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan）
摘要：一个地域特定时期的橱窗展示形式与设计，能够折射出该地域的政治、经济、社会的发展与演变。对20世纪50-80年代武汉 市的橱窗展示形式与设计特点作为案例进行分析与研究，认为20世纪50-80年代正处于中国商业最匮乏的时代，武汉市的橱窗展示 形式与设计主要是在为那个时代的政治和文化做宣传，同时也真实显现了武汉市当时的制造业和商业状况。 关键词：橱窗；展示设计；20世纪50-80年代 Abstract: The shop window design of specific period and region can reflect the development and evolution of politics, economy and society. Some cases in the era of 1950-1980 are analyzed and researched on the display form and design features of shop windows in Wuhan. The most scarce commerce era in China is 1950-1980, and the most shop window display was doing advertising for the political and cultural. These shop windows truly demonstrated the Wuhan local manufacturing and commerce.. Key words: shop window；display design；the Era of 1950-1980

1 1 2 宋澎涛 SONG Pengtao 廉毅 LIAN Yi 贾勇 JIA Yong 1. 沈阳航空航天大学，沈阳 110136（Shenyang Aerospace University，110136Shenyang） 2. 沈阳市城市建设管理局，沈阳 110041（Shenyang urban construction administration，110041 Shenyang）
摘要：绿色基础设施的规划方法与现代城市景观再生设计的结合，成为景观设计研究的重要方向，是建设生态文明城市的概念参 考和具体内容。通过对基于绿色基础设施的城市景观再生设计的典型案例进行分析，深入探讨城市景观再生设计的具体实践手法 及其特点，并指出城市景观再生设计的有效途径和设计策略，提倡顺应自然过程，探究源汇的共生与转化的条件、方法与意义， 从而实现场地资源的可再生与景观设计的可持续发展愿景。 关键词：绿色基础设施；再生设计；共生思想；效益评价；城市景观 Abstract: A significant tendency in theoretical research of landscape design is by combining planning methods of green infrastructure with regenerative design in modern urban landscape. It remains to be a conceptual reference model as well as a concrete content in constructing ecologically-civilized city. Based on analyzing the typical case in regenerative design of urban landscape combined with green infrastructure, this paper aims to discuss the practical methods and its characteristics, and point out efficient path and design strategy. At the same time, it devotes to explore the conditions, means and significance of source-collection that transform and symbiose in regenerative design of urban landscape. It concludes that only by means of following natural process, ecological urban environment can be achieved. Regenerative design is the key to the sustainable development of urban landscape. One should advocate regenerative design to realize the reuse of site resources and sustainable development of urban. Key words: green infrastructure；regenerative design；philosophy of symbiosis；benefit evaluation；urban landscape

17 清代笔筒造型装饰的艺术特征 *
On Artistic Nature of Modeling and Decoration of Brush Pots in Qing Dynasty
钱珑 QIAN Long 赵俊学 ZHAO Junxue 东北林业大学，哈尔滨 150040（Northeast Forestry University，150040 Harbin）
摘要：笔筒是中国传统书房用具之一，也是中国古代匠人精湛工艺的重要体现。明清时期笔筒无论是在技术上还是艺术上，都是 中国传统手工技艺的代表作。通过对清代笔筒的基本造型形式和主要材质的基本特征进行研究，并针对笔筒装饰的艺术性进行分 析，清晰地归纳总结出清代笔筒的造型特点和艺术特征，便于现代研究更好地认识中国古人的文化生活方式、审美情趣以及改造 自然资源的方法。 关键词：清代；笔筒造型；装饰设计 Abstract: Brush pot is one type of Chinese traditional study appliances, and it is an important embodiment of ancient Chinese craftsmanship. Brush pots in Ming and Qing Dynasty represent traditional Chinese craftsmanship, exquisite technique and artistically aesthetic view. This essay is based on a research of the style, materials and basic characteristics of brush pots in Qing Dynasty. This essay contains the analysis on the characteristics of artistic design and modeling design of brush pots in Qing Dynasty. These conclusions can make a better contribution to making a further research on the field of ancient Chinese cultural customs, aesthetic view and methods of remodeling natural resource. Key words: Qing Dynasty；brush pot；decoration design

18 论“艺术概论”课程的双语教学方法 *
On Bilingual Teaching Method of Introduction to Art
李世葵 LI Shikui 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan）
摘要：从现代教育理论的视角出发，结合大学教学实践，探讨了艺术设计类专业必修课程“艺术概论”的双语教学方法，提出5条 双语教学的经验。“艺术概论”课程双语教学，要从学生的实际水平出发，培养学生学习艺术学理论的兴趣和热情；教师应该营 造交流与合作的互动课堂氛围，多采用情境式教学法；运用多媒体技术与网络教学资源来丰富课堂内容；结合艺术创作过程和艺 术作品来讲授艺术学理论；并且应该循序渐进，根据学生的反馈及时调整双语教学内容和方法，以此来培养具备用英语交流学术 思想能力的国际化艺术学人才。 关键词：艺术学；艺术概论；双语教学；教学方法 Abstract: From the perspective of modern educational theory, this paper probes into the bilingual teaching method of the course Introduction to Art based on the university teaching. It puts forward five viewpoints of teaching. The bilingual class should rouse students' interest in the theory of art according to the students' actual knowledge level. Teachers should build an interactive class under the atmosphere of communication and cooperation, mobilize the study enthusiasm with situational teaching method and use multi-media and network teaching resources to enrich teaching contents. It is important to arouse the trainees initiative and creativeness and promote their learning efficiency by aiding the modern teaching facilities. Teachers should teach the art theory with examples of art works and the process of art creation, carry out bilingual teaching step by step, adjust the teaching content and methods in accordance with the feedback of students timely, and cultivate the talents who have the ability to communicate art ideas in English. Key words: the theory of art；introduction to art；bilingual teaching；teaching method

摘要：弗吉尼亚理工暨州立大学是一所成立于 1872 年的综合性公立大学，建筑与设计学院更是弗吉尼亚理工最出色的学院，多年 来一直是全美最好的建筑设计学院之一。其良好的开放实学氛围，与生活实际紧密相连的社会服务态度，以及做中学的动手实践 思想颇具特色，从这三方面展开论述，探讨弗吉尼亚理工建筑与设计学院尤其是工业设计专业的教学特色，将有力于更好地促进 国内设计水平的提高及教学体系的发展。 关键词：弗吉尼亚理工；开放实学；生活实际；动手实践 Abstract: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, popularly known as Virginia Tech, is a public, land-grant, research university founded in 1872, the School of Architecture + Design consistently ranks among the best in the country. Openly teaching, closely contacting with social life, and the practical thought of learning by doing in major teaching are special. The design education features of the school Architecture + Design, especially the major of industrial design are analysed in this paper from the three sides, which will improve the development of Chinese design and design teaching. 20 基于后喻文化的数字娱乐产业课程教学探究 *
Teaching Reform of Digital Entertainment Industry Based on Post-figurative Culture
李婷 LI Ting 杭州电子科技大学，杭州 310018（Hangzhou Dianzi University，310018 Hangzhou）
摘要：数字娱乐产业在新媒体时代成了蓬勃发展的一个产业类别，无论产业规模还是产值都在膨胀式地发展，这对高校理论教学 和课程设计带来极大的挑战。后喻文化在数字娱乐产业课程教学中的重要性，主要体现在作为“数字原住民”的学生与大多数作 为教师的“数字移民”间的“文化反哺”。高校是向数字娱乐产业输送人才的摇篮，而顺应数字大潮发展的数字娱乐产业教学， 应当是具有指导性和前瞻性的一项活动。因此，数字娱乐产业课程的教学改革，需要把握数字娱乐产业的发展脉络和未来趋势， 以新的理念指导学生的学习。后喻文化在创建鲜活的生态课堂，以及充分发挥新一代学生的主观能动性方面，作用积极和显著。 以此为基础，阐述中国数字娱乐产业课程教学的建议。 关键词：后喻文化；数字娱乐产业；教学改革 Abstract: Abstract: Digital entertainment industry is a booming industry categorical born in the current new media era. It brings about great challenges to theory teaching and curriculum design of colleges. The significance of post-figurative culture in digital entertainment industry course teaching is mainly embodied in the “cultural feedback” between students as “digital natives” and “digital immigrants” which are mostly teachers. College is the cradle exporting talents to digital entertainment industry, while the digital entertainment industry complies with the development of digitization tide should be a directive and prospective activity. Therefore, the educational reform of digital entertainment industry curriculum needs to grasp the development course and future trend of digital entertainment industry, and guide students to learn with new conception. The post-figurative culture plays a positive and considerate role in creating dynamic ecological classrooms and giving full play to the subjective initiative of the new generation of students. Thereupon, this article takes these as the basis and background, illustrating briefly the suggestions for Chinese digital entertainment industry course teaching. Key words: Post-figurative culture；digital entertainment industry；teaching reform

21 翻转课堂教学效果研究 *
On Flipped Classroom Teaching Effects
李金城 LI Jincheng 杭州电子科技大学，杭州 310018（Hangzhou Dianzi University，310018 Hangzhou）
摘要：为探究国内外翻转课堂的教学效果，对CSSCI来源期刊和Web of Science数据库中翻转课堂实验类研究论文，进行了梳理和 内容分析。结果表明，翻转课堂教学手段在提升学习者成绩方面是积极的。国内外均缺乏对翻转课堂教学的间接效果研究，CSSCI 数据库中翻转课堂教学实验研究论文的数量较少，实验研究的规范性存在不足。建议在推进实施翻转课堂教学实践中，注重学校 层面的整体性规划，通过注重教学实验研究的规范性，来深入研究翻转课堂的教学效果。 关键词：翻转课堂；教学实验；教学效果 Abstract: The paper reviews on flipped classroom experimental class research papers from CSSCI source journals and Web of Science databases. The results show that the performance of the flipped classroom teaching methods is positive. There is a certain lack of classroom teaching experimental study of the number of domestic flip normative aspects. This study suggests that in advancing the implementation of the flipped classroom teaching practice, should focus on holistic planning at the school level, to strengthen the in-depth study of the effect of teaching and research focus on teaching experiment normative. Key words: Flipped Classroom；instruction experiment；instruction Effect
